snippet: Host Italy was held to a 1-1 draw by lowly Luxembourg in its final World Cup warm-up match before leaving for Brazil.
abstract: Italy's national soccer team is held to a 1-1 draw by Luxembourg in its final World Cup warm-up match before leaving for Brazil; other soccer news noted.
lead_paragraph: Host Italy was held to a 1-1 draw by lowly Luxembourg in its final World Cup warm-up match before leaving for Brazil.

headline.main: Italy Ties Luxembourg in Final World Cup Warm-Up
